resources.string:
Welcome to "Python Quiz"! 
This is a beginners level quiz about the basics of programming and logic. The language used is, obviously, Python! 
The quiz consists of five questions: a free-text question, a multiple right answers question, and three single right answer questions. 
Good luck and enjoy!
Let\'s start by adding your name here
Question #1 Which number(s) will be printed?
Question #2 Considering the order of operations, what would be printed?

Question #3 There is an error in the program below that is causing an infinite loop. The intent of this program is to print as many /"hello/" as the number of people (n). Fix the line that is wrong and write it below.
Input your code here (use space between characters)
Question #4 Calculate the results of the expression below using the values proposed in each case:
Question #5 Mark all the options that prints a list that include the three original Star Wars movies ("A New Hope", "Empire Strikes Back" and "Return of the Jedi")
